openjsip.proxy.plugins

Interface MethodPlugin

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    RegisterPlugin

    public interface MethodPlugin
    Method plugins are plugins that processes messages that are to be handled by Proxy. These messages include messages like OPTIONS, REGISTER, PUBLISH etc. Method plugin interface is a subject of design.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String getMethod() 
      void initialize(java.util.Properties props, Proxy proxy)
      Initializes this plugin
      boolean isInitialized() 
      Response processRequest(Request request)
      Processes request

    • Method Detail

      • initialize

        void initialize(java.util.Properties props,
              Proxy proxy)
                throws MethodPluginException
        Initializes this plugin
        Parameters:
        props - Properties (settings) for this plugin
        proxy - Proxy (here will be interface in future)
        Throws:
        MethodPluginException - if plugin was unable to initialize

      • isInitialized

        boolean isInitialized()
        Returns:
        whether this plugin was initialized

      • getMethod

        java.lang.String getMethod()
        Returns:
        the name of method that is processed by this plugin

      • processRequest

        Response processRequest(Request request)
                        throws MethodPluginException
        Processes request
        Parameters:
        request - Request to process
        Returns:
        Response that is to be returned to the client, or null if plugin was unable to process it
        Throws:
        MethodPluginException - If something goes wrong
